LanguageData.Extract_DeepBlueCorpse.label: process moyo corpse
LanguageData.Extract_DeepBlueCorpse.description: Extract deepblue from a moyo corpse. All other parts of the body are wasted.\n\nThis job uses skills related to drug synthesis.
LanguageData.Make_DBSF.label: synthesize nutrition pack x5
LanguageData.Make_DBSF.description: Synthesize nutrition packs for the deepblue station.
LanguageData.Make_DBSFbulk.label: synthesize nutrition pack x20
LanguageData.Make_DBSFbulk.description: Synthesize multiple nutrition packs for the deepblue station.
